mapper.select: select * from companyInform order by companyInformNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into companyInform( companyInformName, companyName, representative, phoneNumber, address, post, email, insertDate, updateDate, updater ) values( #{companyInformName}, #{companyName}, #{representative}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{post}, #{email}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updater} )
mapper.update: update companyInform set companyInformName = #{companyInformName}, companyName = #{companyName}, representative = #{representative}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address}, post = #{post}, email = #{email}, updateDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updater = #{updater} where companyInformNum = #{companyInformNum}
